trans-unit.source: Represents an item of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et element av en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: En StatusBarItem er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, noe som betyr at det kan inneholde ett enkelt objekt av en annen type (for eksempel en streng, et bilde eller en panelet).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: StatusBarItem objects are used to define items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: StatusBarItem objektene brukes til å definere elementer i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar> is a horizontal area at the bottom of a parent window in which an application can display status information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>er et vannrett område nederst i et overordnet vindu der et program kan vise informasjon om behandlingsstatus.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarItem can contain complex content, such as graphics and text, and can receive events.
trans-unit.target: En StatusBarItem kan inneholde komplekst innhold, for eksempel grafikk og tekst, og kan motta hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar> and StatusBarItem objects cannot receive keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>og StatusBarItem objekter kan ikke motta tastaturfokus.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.
Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBarItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.StatusBarItem"> </xref> klasse.
